title: Install Google Play Services on Amazon’s new Fire Tablets without Root access
text:
Install Google Play Services on Amazon’s new Fire Tablets without Root access 
Published By: AndroidGuys.com - Today 
So for those of you out there who weren’t aware, when you purchase an Amazon Fire tablet, you can’t install just any app that you see fi...
